CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 16, 1966, pg. 1B reads: "Out-Of-Towners - As usual, a large number of out-of-town guests were on hand for the Squaws "Cotton Extravaganza Dinner Dance" at the Holiday House. Some are pictured here.  First row, left to right: Domingo Lanauza, Newark, N.J., Mrs. Robert Jones, Philadelphia; Mrs. Robert Thompson, New York City; Mrs. Fred Humphries, Tallahassee, Fla.; Mrs. John Wall, Cleveland; Mrs. Sherman Gardin, Los Angeles, Calif., and Fred Ferguson, Philadelphia.  Back row: Mrs. Domingo, Lanauza, Newark, N.J.; Horace Roberts, Barbara Mance, Washington, D.C.; Dr. Fred Humphries, Tallahassee, Fla., Robert Thompson, New York City; Amanda German, Philadelphia; Walter McCoy, Houston, Texas and Harriet Ferguson, Philadelphia."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left, first row: Domingo Lanauza, Mrs. Robert Jones, Mrs. Robert Thompson, Mrs. Fred Humphries, Mrs. John Wall, Mrs. Sherman Gardin, and Fred Ferguson; back row: Mrs. Domingo Lanauza, Horace Roberts, Barbara Mance, Dr. Fred Humphries, Robert Thompson, Amanda German, Walter McCoy, and Harriet Ferguson, posed in the Holiday House for Squaws "Cotton Extravaganza" Dinner-Dance, Monroeville
